title: Hide n' seek
body: Please bring back the Crystal Scar map because I love Hide n' seek. My friends and I everytime we log on we get sad that the Crystal Scar map is unavailable. :((((****************PLZZZ****************

replies.body: Your post will be reported and removed just you wait.

Sorry I got on to that post a little late, it's gone now though :P

Also why is this comment section so randomly toxic? Is there some meme I'm missing?

> [{quoted}](name=Tele,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=fWckdOYt,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-14T11:41:10.564+0000)

> Also why is this comment section so randomly toxic? Is there some meme I'm missing?

No, just random Summoners who are being toxic.
Same, I cry everytime when it is unavailable
